page.title: 06Recreation, Aldwark Area.
page.content:
No recreational facilities are provided in Aldwark, but the people gravitate towards Brassington,grid ref. 05430232,where there are such diverse groups as Women's Institute, British Legion, Mothers' Union, Young Farmers' Union and a pre-school playgroup, for the under-fives.
The area is popular with tourists, particularly walkers,and is part of the Peak District National Park. The route of a former railway crosses the SW. corner of the area,and is now used as a long-distance footpath, the High Peak Trail.
